p:
The standard microdilution test was used to determine the MIC of the EOs. The experimental details were similar to those described previously
31 except for yeast suspensions, which were adjusted to 0.5 McFarland standard and then diluted 1:1000 (v/v) with RPMI 1640 medium according to the Clinical and Laboratory Standards Institute
48 . EOs were tested at concentrations ranging from 512 to 1 µg/mL and pure compounds were tested from 64 to 0.125 µg/mL. All assays were conducted in triplicate.
